programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Thriller, Sci Fi ║ 2013 ║ 12
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Martin Freeman and Ian McKellen. Bilbo Baggins marches on towards the Lonely Mountain flanked by Thorin and his band of dwarves. There he is destined to encounter the fire-breathing dragon Smaug, guardian of a precious, mystical stone that bestows great power on anyone who possesses it Peter Jackson - Director Martin Freeman - Bilbo Baggins Ian McKellen - Gandalf the Grey Richard Armitage - Thorin Oakenshield Benedict Cumberbatch - Smaug / Necromancer Evangeline Lilly - Tauriel Cate Blanchett - Galadriel Orlando Bloom - Legolas Luke Evans - Bard the Bowman Aidan Turner - Kili Ken Stott - Balin Graham McTavish - Dwalin James Nesbitt - Bofur Dean O'Gorman - Fili Lee Pace - Thranduil Mikael Persbrandt - Beorn Sylvester McCoy - Radagast Stephen Fry - Master of Laketown Ryan Gage - Alfrid Sarah Peirse - Hilda Blanca Peter Jackson - Albert Dreary John Bell (4) - Bain Peggy Nesbitt - Sigrid Mary Nesbitt - Tilda Manu Bennett - Azog Lawrence Makoare - Bolg Ben Mitchell - Narzug Stephen Ure - Fimbul Craig Hall - Galion Robin Kerr - Elros Eli Kent - Lethuin Stephen Hunter (3) - Bombur Adam Brown - Ori.

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure, the conclusion to Peter Jackson's trilogy, starring Martin Freeman and Ian McKellen. Bilbo and his dwarf friends are facing enemies on all sides. They will have to fight orcs, trolls and each other if they are to keep hold of their gold. programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: The first part of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy based on the book by JRR Tolkien, starring Martin Freeman and Ian McKellen. Encouraged by the wizard Gandalf, Bilbo Baggins leaves the comfort of his home in the Shire to join a band of dwarves in their quest to reclaim the Kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug. It is a journey that will see the plucky hobbit encounter goblins, orcs and a very strange creature called Gollum Peter Jackson - Director Ian McKellen - Gandalf the Grey Martin Freeman - Bilbo Baggins Richard Armitage - Thorin Oakenshield James Nesbitt - Bofur Ken Stott - Balin Sylvester McCoy - Radagast Barry Humphries - Great Goblin Cate Blanchett - Galadriel Ian Holm - Old Bilbo Christopher Lee - Saruman Hugo Weaving - Lord Elrond Elijah Wood - Frodo Andy Serkis - Gollum Aidan Turner - Kili Lee Pace - Thranduil Benedict Cumberbatch - Necromancer Graham McTavish - Dwalin Dean O'Gorman - Fili Stephen Hunter (3) - Bombur Adam Brown - Ori.

On the trail of fortune and glory in Shanghai, Indy is launched on a dangerous new quest that takes him to India via the Himalayas. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indy goes in search of the magical Sankara stone and uncovers an ancient evil that threatens all who come into contact with it Steven Spielberg - Director Harrison Ford - Indiana Jones Kate Capshaw - Willie Scott Ke Huy Quan - Short Round Amrish Puri - Mola Ram Roshan Seth - Chatter Lal Philip Stone - Captain Blumburtt Roy Chiao - Lao Che David Yip - Wu Han Ric Young - Kao Kan Chua Kah Joo - Chen Rex Ngui - Maître d Philip Tann - Chief henchman Dan Aykroyd - Weber Pat Roach - Chief guard.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Harrison Ford, Sean Connery and Denholm Elliott. When archaeologist Henry Jones disappears, his son Indiana joins in the search for him. programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Period action adventure starring Harrison Ford, Ray Winstone, Cate Blanchett and Shia LaBeouf. Nevada in the late 1950s: intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones finds himself up to his neck in trouble again when he encounters Irina Spalko and a gang of Soviet agents at a military base in the desert. However, this is only the start of a series of adventures that will take Indy deep into the Amazon jungle in search of a mysterious crystal skull Steven Spielberg - Director Harrison Ford - Indiana Jones Cate Blanchett - Irina Spalko Ray Winstone - George \Mac\ McHale Shia LaBeouf - Mutt Williams John Hurt - Professor \Ox\ Oxley Karen Allen - Marion Ravenwood Jim Broadbent - Dean Charles Stanforth Igor Jijikine - Dovchenko Alan Dale (2) - General Ross Andrew Divoff - Russian soldier.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Harrison Ford and Karen Allen. Indiana Jones's outrageous exploits take him around the world in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a religious artefact of unspeakable power wanted by the Nazis. With the help of an old flame, Indy takes on his enemies in a terrifying and death-defying battle to the finish Steven Spielberg - Director Harrison Ford - Indiana Jones Karen Allen - Marion Ravenwood Paul Freeman - Belloq Ronald Lacey - Toht John Rhys-Davies - Sallah Denholm Elliott - Brody Wolf Kahler - Dietrich Anthony Higgins - Gobler Alfred Molina - Satipo Vic Tablian - Barranca / Monkey man Don Fellows - Colonel Musgrove William Hootkins - Major Eaton Pat Roach - Giant Sherpa / Big German mechanic Tutte Lemkow - Imam Terry Richards - Swordsman Frank Marshall - Pilot George Harris (2) - Katanga.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Silent Running
programme.desc: Douglas Trumbull's cult sci-fi drama stars Bruce Dern as a botanist charged with looking after Earth's last remaining plant life. Flashing images/mono sound only. (1972)(85 mins).

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The War Of The Worlds
programme.desc: HG Wells' classic sci-fi yarn sees Martians landing on Earth and toasting the planet with heat rays. A scientist works desperately to find their weakness. (1953)(81 mins).

programme.title: The Big Boss (1971)
programme.desc: Sworn to a sacred oath, a man investigates his cousin's disappearance. Action starring Bruce Lee, in Cantonese with subtitles. (1971)(96 mins).

programme.title: Fist of Fury (1972)
programme.desc: On returning to Shanghai to marry his fiancée, a martial arts student discovers his sifu has died under mysterious circumstances. Bruce Lee stars. Discriminatory content. (1972)(102 mins).

programme.title: Star Trek Generations
programme.desc: Time-travelling space epic uniting Patrick Stewart's Capt Picard with William Shatner's James T Kirk. Whoopi Goldberg and Malcolm McDowell co-star. Flashing images. (1994)(114 mins).

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart returns to captain the Enterprise as his crew travel back in time to battle the Borg. Top sci-fi adventure. Contains flashing images. (1996)(106 mins).

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: Theatrical version of Ridley Scott's classic sci-fi thriller, with Harrison Ford as a troubled cop on the trail of fugitive androids. Based on a novel by Philip K. Dick. (1982)(113 mins).

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Superman fights to thwart criminal Lex Luthor's plans for world domination. Christopher Reeve stars as the Man of Steel. Flashing images. (1978)(138 mins).

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Man of Steel Christopher Reeve sacrifices his powers to be with Lois Lane, but needs them back to defeat the evil General Zod. Flashing images. (1980)(123 mins).

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Tech whizz Richard Pryor develops a red kryptonite which splits Superman in two. Will his heroic or evil side win out? Violence/flashing images. (1983)(119 mins).

programme.title: Superman IV - The Quest For Peace
programme.desc: In a bid to save the world, Superman faces Lex Luthor's latest creation - Nuclear Man. Action with Christopher Reeve. Violence/flashing images. (1987)(87mins).

programme.desc: On returning to Shanghai to marry his fiancée, a martial arts student discovers his sifu has died under mysterious circumstances. Bruce Lee stars. Discriminatory content. (1972)(102 mins).

programme.desc: New York subway cops Wesley Snipes and Woody Harrelson try to rob an armoured underground train loaded with millions of dollars. Action comedy with Jennifer Lopez. (1995)(105 mins).
